title: THE LULLABY SONG
content: The wind blows in from the sea tonight, Sleep, little daffodil, sleep, In the sky the little stars twinkle bright, Sleep, little daffodil, sleep. And the windmill goes creaking around and around, And the shades of the night are now purpling the ground, All the flowers close their eyes and are now sleeping sound, So sleep, little daffodil, sleep.

book.title: Windmills and wooden shoes
book.description: 简介： In Windmills and Wooden Shoes we have a continuous story of the doings of the Dutch children, Jan and Katrina and their little friends....
